author: hana ganesa
comment: Nice app! Love how the way it translate some word or even a whole paragraph. It's understandable, nice translation! Also the UI is pretty nice, simple and elegant. I wonder can we change the background? I'm not trying it yet but it would be nice if we can. Overall, i love it. Five stars for this lit app!

Great app, just wish when I copy text a bubble would pop up to use the app, instead of having to bounce back and forth opening and closing programs. Other than that, its awesome。Also, highlight option please! Dont need the whole picture or page translated。

This app seems to perform quite well.  It has text, voice, and lens translation capabilities.  You can even use it for a specific language offline.  The only limitation we have seen is the offline lens function (for Japanese characters) does not work very well.  Otherwise, we are pleased with this app

author: K Narayana Murthy
comment: I hate this app because TELUGU is not included. Telugu is widely spoken in india, next to Hindi language . Microsoft CEO, Satya Nadendla's mother is Telugu.  More than 10 billions speaks enti world.
I updated the newest version and the automatic voice pronunciation part doesn't work anymore. I tried other languages and the same problem that it won't pronounce the word for me as before

author: Nora Golocan
comment: I like it because it translates exactly what i say unlike the other apps i tried. It edits my words and turned out to be scrambled. This apps is bravo!

author: Wing Tang
comment: As a semi fluent Cantonese speaker that grew up in South Wales and wasn't encouraged in the right way to learn, I've struggled to improve my spoken. I'm loving that this has Cantonese included and envisage using it to improve my vocabulary!

author: Simo Bd
comment: I just downloaded it. I tried to compare the same phrase with other apps, this one was by far the closest one to give accurate and understandable translation. I liked it and hopefully stays that good. If you can add the pronunciation to the original text. It would be very helpful. Because if I'm translating something I don't know, it means I need to know how to pronounce it.

author: Ron Alberto
comment: It's not 💯%accurate, but good enough to get the getts of what the other person is saying.. It leaves a lot to your own interpretation which may cause you problems with the other person if you are not careful.

author: nikhil sabanam
comment: Microsoft is such a huge company. Don't you think you should add Telugu because it is 2nd largest spoken language in India, So it will be more comfortable to more people. Byeee byeee I'm uninstalling this app.

author: Hans Pietersen
comment: Works exceedingly well. Translates voice very well and fast, and allows me to translate menus and signs on the fly while travelling Europe. Hard to find fault.

author: Vaibhav Gupta
comment: Awesome! My go to translator since the Google broke its own one! Sure the translations are not perfect, but it definitely works better!
A very valuable communication tool even though I haven't used it to its full capabilities I can say for sure using the text mode was and is a wonderful and flawless experience.

author: Terrence Yunits
comment: It's just not very capable of translating a lot of text at once, like photos of articles and books. It's better for smaller text. I prefer Google, but still looking for a better solution.

author: Santiago Raven
comment: I think this app need to fix specially for Bengali language. sometimes it gets pretty annoying. other then this apps is awesome.

author: Matthew Lee
comment: If you could add similar word prediction or a range of possibilities, it would be perfect. The interface is so much cleaner than Google translate and the photo mode is excellent

author: Antonio Monfermoso
comment: Has become very useful in making sure people can understand you. It's not grammar perfect for example in Arabic but the most important thing is your understood.

author: Ray zx
comment: Easiest translation app ever. Does everything it promised. You never need another translation tool. Everything you can see,hear or write can easily be translated to sound and/or visual. Highly recommend this app.

author: Jans Ruiz
comment: This app is amazing, it still has a few bugs. Have to press the button a few times and it would disconnect before it can be translated. We tried 5 times before it worked, but when it worked it was perfect.

author: Michael Clurman
comment: Excellent.  I've used it overseas several times. I'm always impressed with translation flexibility, the number of languages covered., and the ability to download a Target languge for offline use.
It's really fantastic- the interface is really intuitive and I find the capabilites pretty innovative. Works as a translator but also as a suplement to learning a second language.

author: Brayan Maravillas
comment: Pretty rad. Though I wish it actually helped with offline translating, for I couldn't know words that I needed help in. Also, the languages that I wanted to download didn't download at all.

author: Sarah Dickey
comment: Love it, very useful, actually a very good way of learning languages, would like Irish and Scottish Gaelic on it though.

author: K leo
comment: App seems to work ok, but the offline dictionary files are huge, making it less efficient.

author: Wong Lanang
comment: Translation sometimes not properly translated. Examples, the Mirage from English to Indonesia is also mirage. Overall it is a good apps.

author: AKA_NayNay PLAYz
comment: It's okay.... It doesn't translate sentences that well but it's the best I've seen so far

author: Tina Morris
comment: Got this for work to help with my dyslexia, helps thank you... x :)

author: Cindy High
comment: This is a perfect app for me. Now my coworker/friend can talk more to each other and I'm learning along the  way.

author: benjamin morgan
comment: It's a shame I can only give 5 stars...it deserves an extra star. Nice app

author: Arun Kumar
comment: Less no of languages only in offline translation  But its nice its not much better than google translater
Amazing app, it's really good than the other apps , I had a serious problem before I seen this app with arabic translation but now this application fix my problem.

author: john doe
comment: If i could use it without internet and if Romanian language could be available to the speach text would be a perfect app.

author: V.Lakshminarayanan N.Venkatasubramaniyan
comment: This app is some what slow ok for now, in future should extend it to Indian tongues as well

The app provides ample of languages used in the world to translate to. I found it interesting. It has some additional features to learn basic sentences of different languages. I like it, great job Ms.

author: Frank Todd
comment: Please please put coping and pasting into this app!! It would be the one thing that this is missing.

author: Lisa Lee
comment: Some of the pronunciation accents are not accurate compared to real life speech

author: music101 news101
comment: Nice ... it does the job ... will be better if it can sync with regular text messages on your phone and automatically translate as you receive and send text . With out copy and paste

author: kestrel archer
comment: A very good app, usually translating app can be use only for translation purposes... but the way the app was made it possible for us to even learn a new language easily.

author: Kane McConnell
comment: I'm impressed with the overall performance. The speed of translations is much better than Google. I'm also impressed by the English - Hungarian translation as most engines mangle the differences between the languages. I ran a few often tricky phrases through, and got a good modern day translation each time.  It doesn't seem to know cultural usage, though, which could get an unsuspecting tourist in a hot spot on some phrasings. For example, in Hungarian it is considered highly offensive to use the phrase 'az anyád' (your mother). Although the technical translation is correct, the culturally acceptable phrase is 'az édesanyád' (your sweet mother). It could avoid a punch in the face. 🤣  The pronunciation of Hungarian sounds is nearly native and the spoken speed and intonation is spot on.  There is some tooling confusion in the UI between pins and stars. I don't think it's intuitive to maintain two lists. The pins are also a bit buried under the recent icon while starred phrases appear prominently in the phrasebook, leading the unsuspecting user to believe their pins didn't save if they assume they will appear in the phrasebook.  It is also a bit tedious to have to select a language pair on every panel (spoken vs typed, etc). The app should allow you to adjust the pairing throughout rather than individually. There is no easy swap to reverse translate either. You have to individually select each side of the language pair when you want to reverse them.  Overall, the performance and beautiful interface outweigh the app's minor shortcomings.

author: Ronen Adany
comment: Very fast translation probably due to fact dictionary is downloaded to phone. One issue is sensitivity of microphone not always allow listen and translate of room conversation
